title: Challenges of Typing in Multiple Languages
description: Accents, different layouts, and character sets. How to manage being a polyglot typist.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Layout Switching

Using OS shortcuts (Win+Space, Cmd+Space) to toggle layouts.

The US-International Layout

A hidden gem. Allows typing accents (é, ñ, ü) using the standard US layout with 'dead keys'. Highly recommended for occasional foreign language typing.
